WorkItem.ClosedComment: So which of the cell caching methods for reducing memory usage have you tried?
WorkItem.Description:
Hi All,
      I uploaded 25MB of .xlsx file, but it is not getiing processed and it takes 10GB of RAM and it doesn't free up the RAM what it is taken for processed. That's why we are not able to process other files.
Please suggest some solution and specify the max limit of this application.
      I am wating for your useful response. Thanks in advance.
WorkItem.Summary: Getting RAM problem to process 25MB of .xlsx file

Comments.Message: we simply unset the object to reduce the memory size but it doesn't help. Please suggest some new method and send me some code that can be help us.

Please read the Friending documentation.... particularly sections 4.2.1 and 4.3 of the Developer Documentation, and at examples 06largescale-with-cellcaching.php, 06largescale-with-cellcaching-sqlite.php and 06largescale-with-cellcaching-sqlite3.php
Thanks Mark for your quick reply. I will try and update you.
Thanks Mark for your quick reply. I will try and update you.
